name: Pengi on Ice
description:
Pengi on Ice was made for Mini Jam 124: Warmth

Limitation: Your score serves a purpose

SETTING

Pengi gets washed away on an ice floe! Help him get back home to his dads to get a warm hug! But be careful the ice floe he's on changes form!

GAMEPLAY

A | D  - Move Left | Right 
Space - Jump and Doublejump

Escape - Back to the Main Menu

CREDITS

Xanashea - Game Art 
Soelna - Programming 

Music by Stegoratops

Some Sound Effects by Pixabay
